label: 中国
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: A geographical term applied generally to the provinces (kuni) of the San'yōdō and San'indō. Sometimes only those provinces from Bizen-no-kuni and Inaba-no-kuni westward are meant, and sometimes the term is used for all the provinces between Kyōto and Kyūshū. [国、山陽道、山陰道、備前国、因幡国、京都、九州]
